song.title: Come Home Running
song.lyrics:
[1] . C/E F Oh heart of mine, why must you stray . Am F From one so fair you run away . C/E E7 Am F And one more time you have to pay . C/E F C/E The heaviness of needless shame
[C] . F G So come home running . C His arms are open wide . F G His name is Jesus . C He understands || . F G He is the answer . Am You are looking for .G F G So come home running . C Just as you are
---
[2] . C/E F Oh heart of mine, come back home . Am F You've been too long out on your own . C/E E7 Am F And He's been there all along . C/E F C/E Watching for you down the road
[3] . C/E F Oh child of God so dearly loved . Am F And ransomed by the Savior's blood . C/E E7 Am F And called by name, Daughter and Son . C/E F C/E Wrapped in the robe of righteousness
